availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Patrick H. Sohan (Edmonson County, Kentucky, postmaster)

body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, postmaster. Native of Ireland. Married to Margaret A. Sohan. Father of John J. Sohan and George W. Sohan. Merchant in Edmonson County in 1860. Appointed postmaster in Edmonson County on August 10, 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 115.
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, (accessed via Ancestry.com).
